name: brab
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2

stmt.origin: mp2an(wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), w0), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
stmt.pretty: mp2an((c0[c1]c2 ↔ w0), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌)

body.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), w0)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c2, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), w0)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c2, universe)
-| wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), w0))

stmt.origin: brabg(s0, s1, c0, universe, c2, universe, c1, w0, w1, w2)
stmt.pretty: brabg(s0, s1, c0, universe, c2, universe, c1, w0, w1, w2)

body.origin:
|- wi(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe)), wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), w0))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wb(w2, w0))
-| wceq(c1, copab(s0, s1, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c2)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wbr(c0, c1, c2), w0)
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wcel(c2, universe)
-| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w1, w2))
-| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wb(w2, w0))
-| wceq(c1, copab(s0, s1, w1))
-| diffss(s0, s1)
-| diffsc(s0, c0)
-| diffsc(s0, c2)
-| diffsc(s1, c0)
-| diffsc(s1, c2)
-| diffsw(s0, w0)
-| diffsw(s1, w0)

comment: The law of concretion for a binary relation. (Contributed by NM, 16-Aug-1999.)
